title: Smokin' Aces(2007) - DvDrip - (Eng)
description:
Smokin&#039; Aces (2007)

When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named 
Buddy Israel (Piven) decides to turn state&#039;s 
evidence and testify against the mob, 
it seems that a whole lot of people would 
like to make sure he&#039;s no longer breathing.
